title: Alienware
content: Alienware Corporation is an American computer hardware subsidiary brand of Dell. Their product range is dedicated to gaming computers and can be identified by their alien-themed designs.[5] Alienware was founded in 1996 by Nelson Gonzalez and Alex Aguila.[6][7] The development of the company is also associated[why?] with Frank Azor, Arthur Lewis, Joe Balerdi,[citation needed] and Michael S. Dell. The company's corporate headquarters is located in The Hammocks, Miami, Florida.[8]
